name: Alien Crash Course - Tiny UFO
description:
Controls: 

A - Rotate Left (Counter Clockwise) or Left Arrow

D - Rotate Right (Clockwise) or Right Arrow

Space Bar - Thrust (Go Up)

This is my First Game I created with Unity.  I'm taking a course on Udemy to learn how to create games with Unity. Much More to come!

** Update 2.10 **

Added Rotation with arrow keys. 

Changed re-spawn to each level. When you crash you start in the same level you were in instead of level 1. Once you reach the end of level 4 (Earth) you will start back at level 1. More levels are in development. 

Here's a little clip of the game. 

Music Credit to Sylent Mike (myself)

Check out the course on Udemy!

https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse2/learn/v4/overview
